The image was shared by Jignesh Mevani: an independent MLA from Gujarat, and later deleted as it was found to be a morphed image.
The image was also shared by a Facebook: which had been shared more than 2700 times at the time of writing.
The image was shared by the page I Suppo: which has over 550,000 followers, and has been shared close to 8000 times.
Alt News: a fact-checking organization, found the image to be photoshopped and shared the facts on social media.
